items.name: magnet
items.description: A strong magnet

items.name: otter in a box
items.description: The otter is quietly sitting in the box.

items.name: cat in a shoe
items.description: No explanation necessary.

items.name: pancake
items.description: Someone has taken a bite from it.

items.name: duck
items.description: It looks at you and quacks happily.

items.name: stick
items.description: A pointy stick.

items.name: pancake on a stick
items.description: The pancake now has a stick pointing out of it.

items.name: battle duck
items.description: A very deadly duck.

items.name: old shoe
items.description: It is missing the shoelace.

items.name: cardboard box
items.description: A sturdy box made of thick cardboard.

items.name: battle duck on a box
items.description: The battle duck is now on a box. It's effectiveness is doubled by the higher ground.

items.name: chewing gum
items.description: A large wad of very sticky gum.

items.name: cat
items.description: Meow.

items.name: cat in a box
items.description: How this gets you any closer to finding a way out of here, nobody knows.

items.name: pipe
items.description: A sturdy pipe, which is slightly dented in the middle.

items.name: cookie
items.description: A sticky chocolate chip cookie.

items.name: pipe with cookie stuck inside
items.description: Dammit, you cannot get the cookie out.

items.name: pipe with cookie and chewing gum stuck inside
items.description: Dammit, you cannot get the chewing gum out either.

items.name: handheld teleporter
items.description: Looks like it will work, but it has no power source.

items.name: potted plant
items.description: The flowers are wilting.

items.name: empty pistol
items.description: A pistol with no ammo.

items.name: empty rocket launcher
items.description: Looks like it can pack a punch. Unfortunately, no rockets.

items.name: flower
items.description: A red flower with a petal missing.

items.name: shoe and gum
items.description: An old shoe with gum stuck to the sole.

items.name: sticky plant
items.description: The chewing gum has made this plant sticky.

items.name: key stuck in chewing gum
items.description: A key lodged in some sticky chewing gum.

items.name: key
items.description: A shiny key.

items.name: empty rocket pistol
items.description: A very impractical combination of two weapons.

items.name: otter
items.description: A small furry otter.

items.name: wire
items.description: A long length of copper wire

items.name: wire wrapped key
items.description: A key wrapped in copper wire

items.name: wire wrapped teleporter
items.description: A handheld teleporter wrapped in copper wire

items.name: wire wrapped pipe
items.description: A pipe wrapped in copper wire

items.name: makeshift power source
items.description: A pipe wrapped in copper wire with a magnet inside

items.name: sticky makeshift power source
items.description: A pipe wrapped in copper wire with a magnet inside. Both ends of the wire are covered in gum.

items.name: powered handheld teleporter
items.description: The teleporter buzzes with activity, as you shake the pipe while covering both ends with your hands.

items.name: handheld teleporter manual
items.description: Most of the pages are missing. You can only half read one line: ..not use tel port r    self..

combinations.product: pipe with cookie and chewing gum stuck inside

interactions.message: You aim the device at yourself, but it has no power, so nothing happens.
The key does not fit. Looks like it isn't going to be this easy.
You viciously attack the door with the flower. The flower is completely destroyed. Time for a better weapon.
You throw the weapon at the door. The rocket launcher falls to the floor with a loud clang.
You chip away at the door with the end of your pistol. It barely leaves a dent.
You place the duck next to the door, but it just sits there and does nothing.
Your battle duck rams the stick against the door. Unfortunately it has no effect.
You bash the old shoe against the door, but it doesn't budge.
You throw the pancake at the door. It sticks onto the side for a few seconds before falling off.
You prod the door with the stick. The door remains firmly shut.
You attempt to attach the pancake on a stick to the side of the door. It sticks for a few seconds before falling off.
You slam the box against the door. It doesn't move.
You hit the door several times with the pipe. The door is too strong.
Your attempt at prying the door open with the cookie ends in failure. There is nothing left of your cookie apart from many small crumbs.
You smash the pipe against the door. The door remains shut and the cookie remains stuck.

items: pipe with cookie and chewing gum stuck inside
interactions.message: The pipe does not open the door. The cookie and chewing gum is still stuck inside.
You try to pry the door open with the teleporter. The door doesn't move.
You throw the potted plant into the door. The pot breaks, leaving a mess on the floor.
You place the duck on the shoe. It gives you a puzzled look before stepping off the shoe.
You don't feel desperate enough to jam a stick into the duck yet.
You don't feel desperate enough to jam a stick into the otter yet.
You beat out a drum beat on the box.
You place the cat next to the door. It does not help.
You can't find a way to connect the cat to the teleporter.
You can't find a way to connect the duck to the teleporter.
The duck eats your cookie.
The otter eats your cookie.
Your attempt at feeding the cookie to the cat has failed.
Your otter makes no attempts at opening the door.
Not even a cat in a shoe can open this door.
Placing the otter next to the door has no effect.
There is nothing to hold the copper wire to the teleporter power terminals.
You aim at the door and teleport it away.
The teleporter starts to smoke before teleporting itself away.
